attributes.action: make a law that all toxic cleaner products should contain a Government health warning on their packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many cleaning products have been shown to cause asthma, earache, diarrhoea and depression. So of course the public should, at the very least be warned of the side effects of these products. This could save the NHS a fortune and make the UK a healthier place. (When I was at college cleaners were spraying an air freshener in all the rooms which contained the warning "If this product comes in contact with eyes seek immediate medical advice" !)
